title: Helms Ford – Associate Locator Portal
overview: Helms Ford, a global leader in hotel and meeting planning services, needed a powerful associate locator tool to connect clients with their worldwide network of hospitality professionals. The solution had to be scalable, searchable, and visually interactive, enabling users to easily find the right associate by name, region, or expertise.

features.heading: Global Map Search
features.text: by regions: Africa & Middle East, Americas, Asia Pacific, and Europe.

features.heading: Keyword Search
features.text: by first name, last name, or location.

features.heading: Dynamic Profile Listings
features.text: with associate details and real-time visibility.

features.heading: Role-Based Login
features.text: for secure access by clients, associates, and admins.

features.heading: Mobile-optimized UI/UX
features.text: for seamless user experience across all devices.

features.heading: Scalable System
features.text: built to handle thousands of associate profiles efficiently.

techStack.heading: Integrations
techStack.text: Interactive World Maps API, Search Filters, Email Notifications
